item.title: 《死亡诗社》有感
item.author: 作者
item.description: In the movie ‘Dead Poets Society‘ , Wilton school ,the preparatory school for Ivy League University,was famous for its school motto — Tradition,Honor, Discipline and Excellence, which leads the school to success.However, as time passed, its core content changed.The school turned into a prison and imprison students.And then, Poetry teacher Mr. Keating, used to be a student here.He tried his best to tell his students the right way of life.And
